score.pbp: Howie Kendrick grounds into a double play, shortstop Alex Cora to second baseman Danny Espinosa to first baseman Michael Morse. Bobby Abreu scores. Vernon Wells out at 2nd.

atbat.des: Howie Kendrick grounds into a double play, shortstop Alex Cora to second baseman Danny Espinosa to first baseman Michael Morse. Bobby Abreu scores. Vernon Wells out at 2nd.
atbat.des_es: Howie Kendrick batea rodado batea para doble matanza, campo corto Alex Cora a segunda base Danny Espinosa a primera base Michael Morse. Bobby Abreu anota Vernon Wells a cabo a 2da.
